data.comment: Today's referee, Vitaly Meshkov, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 2, Vitaly Meshkov signals a Sochi throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Throw-in Sochi.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sochi at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 6, Sochi's Aleksandr Rudenko breaks free at Akhmat-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
Sochi needs to be cautious. Akhmat Grozny have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 8, In Grozny Sochi attack through Nikita Burmistrov. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Ibrahim Tsallagov for Sochi gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Akhmat Grozny's Andres Ponce misses with an attempt on goal.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Akhmat Grozny's half?
Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 21, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Throw-in for Sochi at Akhmat-Arena.
Vladimir Iljin of Akhmat Grozny smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 24, Christian Noboa scores to make it 0-1 at Akhmat-Arena.
Great play from Nikita Burmistrov to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny close to the penalty box.
In the minute 27, Vitaly Meshkov awards Sochi a goal kick.
Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Akhmat Grozny's Vladimir Iljin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sochi have a goal kick.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 31, Akhmat Grozny's Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov breaks free at Akhmat-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 32, In Grozny Akhmat Grozny attack through Marat Bystrov. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Sochi at Akhmat-Arena.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Sochi's half.
In the minute 35, Akhmat Grozny drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Sochi in their own half.
In Grozny, Vladimir Iljin (Akhmat Grozny) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
Vladimir Iljin of Akhmat Grozny gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Sochi at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 39, Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny have a dangerous throw-in.
Nikita Burmistrov (Sochi) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 40, Vladimir Iljin (Akhmat Grozny) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
Akhmat Grozny pushes forward through Ismael Silva, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Vitaly Meshkov blows against Akhmat Grozny's Marat Bystrov for offside.
Vitaly Meshkov will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Akhmat Grozny are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Grozny.
The second-half has started.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Sochi.
In the minute 49, Akhmat Grozny drives forward and Bernard Berisha gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Sochi.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half?
In the minute 52, Vitaly Meshkov awards Sochi a goal kick.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Sochi.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Sochi to take a throw-in in Akhmat Grozny territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Sochi in Grozny.
Vitaly Meshkov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 56, Throw-in Akhmat Grozny.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In Grozny Sochi's Joaozinho is caught offside.
In the minute 58, Vladimir Iljin gets his shot on target but fails to score for Akhmat Grozny.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to Sochi's area.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 63, Sochi have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 65, Akhmat Grozny make their first substitution with Georgi Melkadze replacing Andres Ponce.
Evgeny Kharin is replacing Vladimir Iljin for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
In the minute 69, Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Sochi at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 73, Danyl Prutsev is replacing Aleksandr Rudenko for the away team.
Vladimir Fedotov (Sochi) is making a second substitution, with Artur Yusupov replacing Joaozinho.
Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
In the minute 76, Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Vitaly Meshkov.
Akhmat Grozny surge into the attack at Akhmat-Arena but Aleksandr Putsko’s header is off-target.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Oleg Ivanov is on a sub for Maksim Maksimovich Nenahov for Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny are coming forward and Marat Bystrov gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Vitaly Meshkov awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Akhmat Grozny awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Elmir Nabiullin for Sochi gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
In the minute 80, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Free kick Sochi.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Sochi at Akhmat-Arena.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
In the minute 85, Vitaly Meshkov signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Sochi's half.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Andrey Talalaev is making the team's fourth substitution at Akhmat-Arena with Idris Umaev replacing Artem Timofeev.
The home team replace Ismael Silva with Anton Shvets.
Sochi's Christian Noboa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 86, Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Sochi's half.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Akhmat Grozny drive upfield and Evgeny Kharin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sochi defender.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Sochi.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Grozny.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In Grozny Akhmat Grozny drive forward through Bernard Berisha. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vitaly Meshkov signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Elmir Nabiullin is booked for the away team.
Timofey Margasov (Sochi) has received a first yellow card.
